data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stonis, Jonas R., Diškus, Arūnas, Remeikis, Andrius, Torres, Nixon Cumbicus (2016): First description of leaf-mining Nepticulidae and Tischeriidae (Insecta, Lepidoptera) feeding on the Chilean endemic plant genus Podanthus Lag. (Asteraceae). Zootaxa 4061 (2): 119-130, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4061.2.2
